name: play
description: üéµ Play music in your voice channel

options.name: title
options.description: Enter the title of the music. I just need the begining if the file is local

options.name: queueselector
options.description: Place of your music in the queue

name: stop
description: ‚èπÔ∏è Stop playing and clear the queue

options.name: queueselector
options.description: Place of the music in the queue

name: queue
description: Display or manage the music queue

options.name: delete
options.description: üöÆ Delete element(s) in the queue

options.name: elements
options.description: 1 number : single. 2 numbers : range. More than 2 : specific

options.name: clear
options.description: ‚èπÔ∏è Clear the queue. Same as /stop

options.name: display
options.description: Display the queue (and remove the older one)

name: voicetracking
description: Recieve an alerte when a friend connect himself in a voice channel

options.name: enable
options.description: üîî‚úÖ Activate the service

options.name: disable
options.description: üîî‚ùå Desactivate the service (your friend will not longer recieve notification)

options.name: status
options.description: üîî Display your settings and the allowed user (I will you a DM and pin the message)

options.name: add
options.description: üîî‚ûï Link a user to channel, and recieve a notification when he is connected to it

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to track

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel you want to link to the user (a user can have multiple channel)

options.name: remove
options.description: üîî‚ûñ Delete notification for a user and a channel, for a user or for a channel

options.name: user
options.description: Fill this field only to delete the user and all his channel

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel where the user is linked to

options.name: allow
options.description: üîî‚úÖ Allow an user to be notified when you are connected to a voice channel

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to allow

options.name: revoke
options.description: üîî‚ùå Revoke an autorization

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to revoke from your autorization list
